column2: Customize the appearance of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, overriding the choices determining how their portrait is outfitted.
column3: Personnaliser la tenue de §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, en évitant le choix des vêtements et des coiffures.
column4: Passen Sie die Kleidung von §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, über die Auswahl der Kleidung und Kopfbedeckung.
column6: Personalizar el atuendo de §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, anulando la elección de ropa y sombrerería.

column2: You can customize the way §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! looks. This has no gameplay effects beyond appearance. Select which aspect you would like to change.
You can customize the attire §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! is wearing. Select which part of the outfit you would like to change.
Select the headgear worn by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\nThe current selection is the §Y[From.ca_headgear.GetValue]§!th option.
Select the clothes worn by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\nThe current selection is the §Y[From.ca_clothes.GetValue]§!th option.
You can pick the French headgear accessories that can be combined with the regular worn headgear for §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
Select the headgear overlayer worn by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\nThe current selection is the §Y[From.ca_overlayer.GetValue]§!th option.
Select the headgear underlayer worn by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\nThe current selection is the §Y[From.ca_underlayer.GetValue]§!th option.
You can customize the style §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! is wearing their hair. Select which type of hair you would like to change.
Select the hairstyle for §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\nThe current selection is the §Y[From.ca_hair.GetValue]§!th option.
Select the beardstyle for §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\nThe current selection is the §Y[From.ca_beard.GetValue]§!th option.
You can customize the injuries afflicting §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, or the coverings of them. Select which part of the face you would like to change.
Select the position of scars for §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
Select the mask covering §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!s face.\nThe current selection is the §Y[From.ca_mask.GetValue]§!th option.
Select the blindfold or eyepatch used by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\nThe current selection is the §Y[From.ca_eyepatch.GetValue]§!th option.
